name: Spaceopoly: a multiplayer sci-fi adventure game
blurb: A planet colonizing, rocket ship flying, laser shooting, multiplayer space simulator.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER - A heartfelt thank you! We really appreciate your support.
EXPLORER - \r\nYou will be rewarded with a copy of the game and an exclusive desktop wallpaper for your iPhone and iPad.

GALACTIC EXPLORER - In addition to the Explorer rewards you will also receive (1) unique Kickstarter supporter spaceship to cruise around with in Spaceopoly! (2) Access to our members only forum: where you will you be able to see the latest game features, and share your suggestions as the game enters development. (3) A digital copy of JJ\u2019s Battle Fleet for PC, Mac, iPhone or iPad. Your choice!
GALACTIC EXPLORER - \r\nIn addition to the Explorer rewards you will also receive a unique Kickstarter supporter spaceship to cruise around with in Spaceopoly!
SHIP CAPTAIN -  In addition to the Explorer and Galactic Explorer rewards you will also receive a Game art poster signed by the creators of Spaceopoly. We\u2019ll have designs up soon!

EARLY BIRD - In addition to the Explorer, Galactic Explorer and Advisor "FR4NK" rewards you will be among the first to explore the galaxy of Spaceopoly as a beta tester. You will also receive in-game acknowledgment on our supporters page.

ADVISOR \u201cFR4NK\u201d  - In addition to the Explorer and Galactic Explorer rewards you will also receive a personalized voicemail greeting recorded by \u201cFR4NK,\u201d our onboard robot assistant. We will contact you at the end of our kickstarter asking you what greeting you would like to use (greetings must be 30 words or less).

DELEGATE - \r\nIn addition to the Explorer, Galactic Explorer and Advisor "FR4NK" rewards you will also receive a custom Spaceopoly iPhone wood cover by Toast, a local Portland, OR company in walnut, bamboo or ash. We can offer covers for iPhone 4, 4S and 5.

AMBASSADOR OF PLANETS - \r\nIn addition to the Explorer, Galactic Explorer, Advisor "FR4NK" and Delegate rewards you will also be able to name a planet. Some planets are owned by the Galactic Parliament (the big honchos in the Spaceopoly universe). Political supporters are often rewarded by having newly inducted government planets named in their honor. Join these elite few and receive the right to name a planet. Your planet will exist on all servers/instances of the game. We will contact your at the end of our kickstarter for the name you would like used. This can be your real name, a nickname or something funny but, please, no vulgar, inappropriate or offensive names.

GALACTIC WUNDERKIND -\r\nIn addition to the Explorer, Galactic Explorer, Advisor "FR4NK" and Delegate rewards you will also receive a 1 hour skype call with the creators of Spaceopoly on how to get started making your own game. We will contact you at the end of our kickstarter to schedule the call.

KING OF THE STARS - \r\nSo you want to be famous? A star system is a big place full of planets and we are giving a few supporters the unique opportunity to have their names immortalized in Spaceopoly history. In addition to the Explorer, Galactic Explorer, Advisor "FR4NK", Delegate and Galactic Wunderkind rewards you will also be able to name an entire star system in the Spaceopoly universe. Your star system will exist on all servers/instances of the game. We will contact you at the end of the Kickstarter asking you for the name you'd like used. This can be your real name, a nickname or something funny but, please, no vulgar, inappropriate or offensive names.

IMMORTAL  - \r\nWow! You are amazing! To thank you for your incredible support, we will build a statue after your likeness in the game. Your statue will exist on all servers/instances of the game. You will also receive the Explorer, Galactic Explorer, Advisor "FR4NK", Delegate and Galactic Wunderkind. We will contact you at the end of our kickstarter to retrieve the image you\u2019d like used. This can be a picture of you, your pet or something funny but, please, nothing inappropriate.

CROWN EMPEROR OF SPACEOPOLY - You are our hero. For this extraordinary level of support, we will reward you with the cool stuff in all the previous levels. Also, we will fly you and a guest to Portland, OR from anywhere in the US to have dinner with the game creators. Plus, we will crown you Emperor of Spaceopoly. In person.
